actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 96-532.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the printing as a House document of the staff report to the Committee on Foreign Affairs entitled "The Assassination of Representative Leo J. Ryan and the Jonestown, Guyana Tragedy".

summary.text: Directs the printing, as a House document, of the staff report to the Committee on Foreign Affairs entitled "The Assassination of Representative Leo J. Ryan and the Jonestown, Guyana Tragedy". Provides that additional copies of the report, not to exceed a cost of $1,200, be printed for the use of the Committee on Foreign Affairs.

titles.title: A resolution providing for the printing as a House document of the staff report to the Committee on Foreign Affairs entitled "The Assassination of Representative Leo J. Ryan and the Jonestown, Guyana Tragedy".
